entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 29. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
